name: BOSCH GWS8-45 4-1/2 Inch 7.5 Amp Angle Grinder with Lock-On Switch, Lightweight Design, and Durable Protection Guard for Metal and Concrete Grinding
short_description: COMPACT: Weighing only 4.2 lbs., the Bosch GWS8-45 Angle Grinder is lightweight and compact. Its slender grip circumference allows users to work comfortably for longer.
POWER: The angle grinder features a powerful 7.5-amp motor to produce 11,000 no-load rpm for professional cutting and grinding applications.
ERGONOMIC: With its slim-grip design, the GWS8-45 angle grinder provides outstanding user comfort. Its two-position side handle allows for greater control and utility.

PROTECTION: The grinder also provides directed air flow to divert dust from vital components for enhanced durability and longer tool life. The burst-protection guard provides quick adjustments for user security.
LONGEVITY: Bosch's Service Minder brush system shuts off the tool when preventative maintenance is required, extending overall tool life.
product_description: The BOSCH GWS8-45 4-1/2-inch angle Grinder is a light, ergonomic Grinder, with a slender grip circumference that allows users to work comfortably for extended periods. This 4.2 lbs. Tool delivers plenty of power, with a 7.5-Amp motor that produces 11,000 no-load RPM. It has directed air flow that diverts dust away from vital components. BOSCH service Minder brush system shuts off the tool when preventative maintenance is required, which helps to eliminate guesswork. This Grinder has a two-position side handle. It has a burst-protection quick adjustable guard designed for user protection, a fast-change Disc change and a large spindle lock. Includes: (1) auxiliary handle; (1) wheel guard; (1) flange Kit; (1) Spanner wrench; (1) 4-1/2-inch abrasive wheel.

name: DEWALT Angle Grinder, 4-1/2-Inch, 11-Amp, 11,000 RPM, With Dust Ejection System, Corded (DWE402W)
short_description: 11 Amp AC/DC 11,000 RPM motor designed for faster material removal and higher overload protection
Dust Ejection System provides durability by ejecting damaging dust and debris particles that enter the tool through the air intake vents
Quick-Change Wheel release allows tool free wheel removal without the need for a wrench
One-Touch Guard allows for 360 degree rotation of the guard with a single action
Matching wheel flanges allow the use of common accessories
product_description: The DEWALT DWE402W 4-1/2" Small Angle Grinder with Wheel features an 11 Amp AC/DC 11,000 RPM motor which is designed for faster material removal and higher overload protection. The Dust Ejection System provides durability by ejecting damaging dust and debris particles that enter the tool through the air intake vents. It has a low profile gear case allows access into tight spaces, along with a Quick-Change wheel release that allows tool free wheel removal without the need for a wrench. A One-Touch Guard allows for 360 degree rotation of the guard with a single action, and a paddle switch with safety lock-off prevents accidental start up. The matching wheel flanges allow the use of common accessories. Includes: (1) Grinder, One-Touch Guard, 2-Position Side Handle, Wrench, 4-1/2" Abrasive Wheel.

name: SKIL 9295-01 6.0 Amp 4-1/2-Inch Angle Grinder
short_description: Powerful 6.0 Amp Motor with 11,000 RPM
Tool-less guard for quick adjustments
Heavy duty metal gear housing for added ruggedness and durability
Compact grip design for comfort and control
Vibration-reducing handle with wrench storage
product_description: The Skil 9295-01 4-1/2-Inch Angle Grinder features a powerful 6.0 Amp Motor. Tool-less Guard Adjustment. Heavy duty metal gear housing for added durability. Compact grip design for comfort and control.

name: Bosch GWS10-450P 4-1/2 In. Ergonomic Angle Grinder with Paddle Switch
short_description: Ergonomic, powerful grinder design – engineered with a narrow grip zone and light weight but with considerable power
Ultra compact powerful motor – professional 10-amp motor delivers up to 11,000 no-load rpm
Multi-grip paddle switch – provides increased grip options for better ergonomics, comfort and control
Anti-vibration side handle – allows for improved user comfort and control
Epoxy-coated field windings – extend motor lifetime by preventing dust and debris from penetration the motor windings
product_description: This 4-1/2 In. ergonomic angle grinder features a narrow grip zone for all-day comfort and control, combined with a powerful 10-amp motor. The Bosch GWS10-450P angle grinder delivers results, producing up to 11,000 no-load rpm for maximum productivity in grinding and cutting applications. The tool weighs 4.6 Lbs. It features a multi-grip paddle switch, which provides increased grip options for better ergonomics, comfort and control. Equipped with epoxy-coated field windings, double-sealed bearings and direct-motor cooling, this grinder is built for a longer tool life. It features spiral bevel gears for smooth transmission of power. For added convenience, it has an anti-vibration side handle and an adjustable tool-free guard with multiple fixed-adjustment settings to allow the user to position the guard in a variety of working angles. It has an updated gearhead mounting collar, which is now compatible with all Bosch concrete guards.

name: DEWALT Angle Grinder, 7-Inch, 13-Amp, 8,000 RPM, With Dust Ejection System, Corded (DW840)
short_description: Plastic / Metal
Made in the USA or Imported
13 Amp motor
Guard can be adjusted to redirect sparks away from user
Single-wrench wheel changes with spindle-lock button
Runs off of AC/DC power
product_description: Complete a variety of metal grinding and cutting applications with the 7 in. (180mm) Medium Angle Grinder. Featuring a 13 Amp motor that delivers 2,250 UWO and 8,000 RPM, this grinder includes a 7 in. Type 27 Guard that helps users redirect sparks away from their face.

name: Cordless Angle Grinder 4-1/2 inch, Power Angle Grinder with 2x4.0Ah Battery, 10000 RPM Brushless Metal Grinder with Cutting Wheels, Electric Grinder Tool for Wood Metal Cutting & Grinding
short_description: [ Brushless Motor & 2*4.0Ah Battery ] -- Cordless angle grinder is equipped with a powerful brushless motor that can rotate up to 10000 RPM. 2 x 4.0Ah high-capacity batteries can ensure long-term operation and greatly improve your work efficiency.

[ 3-Speed Adjustment ] -- 4-1/2 inch angle grinder offers 3 speed settings: High Speed - 10000 RPM, Medium Speed - 7500 RPM, and Low Speed - 5000 RPM. You can easily adjust speed to meet cutting, grinding and various needs.

[ Cordless & Easy To Use ] -- Angle grinder tool with cordless design is portable and efficient, which will make you more convenient and freedom. You can use it indoors, outdoors and anywhere else with no limits of sockets or cords.

[ Safety & Ergonomic Design ] -- Battery powered angle grinder is equipped with rotatable safety cover to block sparks and debris. Lock switch allows metal grinder to run continuously, so you don't have to keep pressing trigger. Rubberized 2-position auxiliary handle can increase your working comfort and control accuracy.

[ Universal Size ] -- Cordless grinder tool has 7/8 inch arbors. It can compatible with various 4-1/2 inch blades, discs and grinding wheels. The angle grinder is equipped with a spindle lock, which allows you to replace the disc faster and easier.

[ Complete Set You Need ] -- Angle grinder kit comes with a full set of accessories, including: 1 x Cordless Angle Grinder, 3 x 4-1/2" Cutting Wheels, 2 x 4.0Ah Batteries, 1 x Fast Charger, 1 x Wrench, 1 x Removable Handle, 1 x Safety Cover, 1 x Manual, 1 x Portable Tool Box.

[ Excellent Customer Service ] -- FULLYEA is committed to providing you with high-quality tools and excellent service. If you have any questions about this cordless grinder, please feel free to contact us!

name: Makita 9557PB 4-1/2" Paddle Switch Angle Grinder, with AC/DC Switch
short_description: Powerful 7.5 AMP motor delivers 11,000 RPM for high output power
Compact design with small 2-1/2" diameter barrel and weighs only 4.5 lbs. for added comfort
Labyrinth construction seals and protects the drive gear and bearings from contamination for longer tool life
Lock-on/off feature for continuous operation
AC/DC switch for use with alternative power source
4-1/2-inch angle grinder with paddle switch seals motor and bearings from contamination
7.5 amp motor delivers a no-load speed of 10,000 RPM
Small circumference barrel grip for improved handling; spindle lock for easy wheel changes
Includes grinding wheel, wrench, side handle, flange and wheel guard
1-year limited warranty
product_description: The product is 4-1/2" Angle Grinder AC/DC, Powerful 7.5A Motor For Heavy Professional Grinding Applications, Includes 4-1/2" Grinding Wheel, Lock Nut Wrench, Lock Nut, Inner Flange, Wheel Guard, Side Handle.. Easy to use. The product is manufactured in China.

name: Hammerhead 6-Amp 4-1/2 Inch Angle Grinder with 3 pcs Grinding Wheel – HAAG060
short_description: Tool-free Guard Adjustment - No tools are needed to adjust the safety guard position
Onboard Wrench Storage - Wrench Storage is conveniently located in the side handle. Never search for the wrench again
Powerful 6-Amp Motor - With a 6-Amp motor, this grinder can handle big and small household tasks
Paddle Switch - This grinder is equipped with paddle switch safety lock to prevent unintended powering
3 Position Side Handle -The adjustable 3-position side handle allows greater leverage, control and firmer grip
product_description: A powerful angle grinder for grinding and cutting The Hammerhead angle grinder tool is designed for all grinding applications. With 6-Amp of power, a strong motor, and various angle grinder accessories, this grinder will serve as metal grinder, metal cutter, tile cutter, or wood grinder(cutting guard and cutting disc not included). The 4-1/2 inch grinding wheel is well suited for small jobs around the house, major rust cleaning projects, and other grinding or cutting tasks. More About This Product: ●Versatile and convenient grinding; ●Power: 6-Amp; ●No-Load Speed: 12, 000RPM; ●Wheel Size: 4-1/2 Inch.

Includes: (1) Side handle (1) Inner and outer flange (1) 5 in. Type 27 guard (1) 4.5 in. Type 27 guard (1) 6 in. Type 27 guard (1) Grinder
Dust Ejection System provides durability by ejecting damaging dust and debris particles that enter through the air intake vents

product_description: The DWE43116 4-1/2-inch to 6-inch High Performance Hand Grinder with Trigger Grip is powered by a 13-amp motor and equipped with the Dust Ejection System technology designed to protect the grinder tool from damaging dust and debris that enters through air intake vents.

name: Angle Grinder, 7.5-Amp 4 1/2 inch Electric Grinder Power Tools 12000 RPM with Cutting and Grinding Wheels, Flap Disc and Auxiliary Handle for Cutting, Grinding, Polishing
short_description: Powerful Grinder Tool: 7.5 Amp motor with a maximum output of 900 W and a maximum speed of 12000 RPM, this angle grinder is designed to meet the most demanding applications; The thicker coil pure copper motor delivers 1.5 times more power and high efficiency, maintains low heat generation and high torque operation, highly resistant to overloads even during long hours of operation

Ergonomic Design & Lightweight：This metal grinder is slim, lightweight and compact for tight spaces; The ergonomically designed comfort body grip improves comfort and control; The ultra-slim body weighs only 3.9 lbs, for fatigue-free use, even over long periods of time

Safer & More Durable：During operation, the angle grinder's wheel guard prevent sparks and metal shavings from flying, enhancing safety; The cast metal gear and double heat treatment improves the hardness and durability of the grinder tool; Reinforced metal gears, labyrinth dustproof structure and automatic brush breakage protection device can effectively extend tool life

Convenient Operation：The spindle lock allows for faster and easier single wrench wheel changes; 2-position auxiliary handle provide more comfortable control and versatility at different angles and materials, reducing the burden on the user; 1.8 m extended power cord greatly enhances operating distance and space

Cool and Clean Work：Three-dimensional vent design provides strong heat dissipation, continue to work for a day without scalding, and prevent dust from entering the product surface and internal space, protect the motor and prolong the use of time

Compatible and General Use: Revvstark 4-1/2 angle grinder is 7/8" arbor size with M14 spindle thread compatible with most of 4-1/2-inch accessories such as cut off wheel, diamond saw blade, grinding disc, flap disc, surface grinding wheel, etc
Package Included：1 x Angle Grinder,1 x Wheel guards, 3 x Cutting wheels, 2 x Metal grinding wheels, 1 x Flap discs(40 grit), 1 x Side handle, 1 x Spanner, 2 x Carbon brushes, 1 x user manual
